title: Adaptation
key_events: Adrian has adapted to Stage 2 synesthesia, can function again
Dr. Okonkwo reveals signal contains embedded instructions - programming
Marcus theorizes Voyager became intelligent after passing through thin place
Discussion of whether Voyager is helping or controlling humanity
Dr. Okonkwo considers trying to communicate with Voyager
Adrian recognizes his emotional void is becoming normal
Marcus still distressed, not fully flat yet

character_development.Adrian: Fully emotionally flat, adapted to synesthesia, comfortable with void, documenting transformation
character_development.Marcus: Still has emotional fragments, distressed by loss, not yet accepting
character_development.Dr. Okonkwo: Exhausted, discovered signal is programming, considering communication with Voyager

planted_elements: Voyager possibly intelligent - develops through trilogy
Attempt to communicate with Voyager concept
Void becoming comfortable - leads to Stage 3
transformation_stage: Stage 2 - synesthesia stabilized, emotional void complete, holistic information processing
